summary:
These custom designed (new models) bound weapons were designed in conjunction with my Aegis Shield Ward spells (available separately) for Mages who don\'t want to carry conventional weapons or shields. 

In addition to sword and bow, I included a bound dagger for those who are interested in utilizing the Stealth advantages available with daggers.
descriptionHtml:
Bound Dragonslayer Weapons 1.1

These custom designed (new models) bound weapons were designed in conjunction with my Aegis Shield Ward spells (available separately) for Mages who don\'t want to carry conventional weapons or shields.

In addition to sword and bow, I included a bound dagger for those who are interested in utilizing the Stealth advantages available with daggers.

Similar to the vanilla Dragonbane Katana, these bound weapons do extra damage to Dragons.

[u]Description[/u]: 

Creates a magic weapon for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel. Does 40 points of extra damage to dragons, 10 points of shock damage to others, fills a soul gem if target dies within 20 seconds.

These spells operate in the Conjuration School of Magic

[u]Operation[/u]:

- Spell Tome Books are initially placed in inventory at game startup
- Activate in Conjuration section of the Magic menu

[u]Notes[/u]:

- Conjuration Perk Mystic Binding increases damage for bound weapons

[u]Damage Specifications[/u]: (without Mystic Binding Perk)

Sword = 11
Dagger = 9
Bow = 18

[u]Change Log[/u]:

Version 1.1 May 06, 2012 PST)

- Added missing textures
- Fixed sword being replaced by bow with Mystic Binding Perk
- Fixed misspelling of word \"Dovahkiin\" engraving on sword and dagger
- Fixed missing bound arrows 

Version 1.0 May 05, 2012 PST)

- Initial version
author: Phoenixn aka Observe
